subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which is the capital of Rajasthan and which famous monument is located in Jaipur?
question_hi: राजस्थान की राजधानी और जापान में प्रमोन क्या है?
explanation_en: Amber Fort is a famous monument in Jaipur, Rajasthan. Hawa Mahal is a popular monument in Jaipur as well, but Amber Fort holds greater historical significance.
